1.title: Welcome Note
1.description:
This is my submission for the position of Full-Stack Developer at Finzarc.
I've designed the UI to be intuitive & simple for users to navigate through. The primary source of inspiration for the design is Google Keep.

2.title: Features Included
2.description:
-- Completed Login and Signup page with styling
---- Added validations in login for - user not found
---- Added validations in registration for - invalid email format, 
     minimum password length, minimum username length
-- Security Validations; user cannot access dashboard without 
   logging in
-- Tasks can be created using plus button on bottom right
-- All existing tasks can be edited
-- Tasks are saved in the following ways -
---- Clicking Done while editing a task
---- Using debouncing (1 second after a user stops typing)
---- Whenever the task status is changed between pending and 
     complete
---- When a user clicks outside the modal, data is autosaved
-- Notes also sync to the dashboard from modal every time a save 
   occurs.

3.title: Features to be included
3.description:
Unfortunately due to lack of time and some preplanned personal commitments I was unable to add the delete feature.

Here is a list of all other features I was planning on adding given the time -
-- User can drag and reorder tasks in a grid format
-- User can add deadlines to tasks
-- User can add labels to each note
-- OAuth Login option using flow
